widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 10), size = (690, 50), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 5), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 50 }

screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) count = len(self.list) if count > 10: count = 10 offset = 32 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 20
if (720 > wsizex): wsizex = 720 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 32 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)/2, (720-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,0), size=(300, 30), text = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(310,0), size=(75, 30), text = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 30 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (20, 10), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 17), size = (340, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 26)], "itemHeight": 65 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 70 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (100,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10,12),size = (100,75),png = 4),# index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,10),size = (580,25),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 1),# index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,40),size = (370,20),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 5),# index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,70),size = (370,20),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 6),# index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500,40),size = (200,20),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 7),# index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500,70),size = (200,20),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 8),# index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (100,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,20),size = (690,28),font=2,flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 0),# index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,50),size = (690,50),font=3,flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 1),# index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular",22),gFont("Regular",18),gFont("Regular",24),gFont("Regular",20)], "itemHeight": 100 }

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 1), size = (315, 24), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 30), size = (315, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 are the results ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 52 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 1), size = (550, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 25), size = (550, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (940, 5), size = (150, 15), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (940, 25), size = (150, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 49 }
